full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Temporary Help Services

## Tender Details

### Reference Number: cb-5501-92153899
### Solicitation Number: S4359119
### Publication Date: 2023-06-05
### Tender Closing Date (UTC-4): 2023-06-12 13:30:00
### Amendment Number: 2
### Amendment Date: 2023-06-12

## Description of the Requirement

Temporary Help Services Requirement
Description: The Department of National Defense (DND) seeks to establish a temporary help services arrangement to support its operations within the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Security Clearance Requirement

Resources requiring a TOP SECRET SIGINT and NATO SECRET security clearance will be working on this contract.

## Contract Details

### Expected Contract Start Date: None
### Expected Contract End Date: None
### Tenders Status: Expired

## Procurement Details

### Tender Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
### Tender Status: Expirod (Expired)
### Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
### Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Phone: (613) 971-7955
Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

## Awarded Contractors

The following contractors have been invited to submit proposals:

* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
	+ Special Advisor
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
	+ Special Advisor
* CGI Information Systems and Management Consultants Inc.
	+ Special Advisor
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
	+ Special Advisor
* DBHS Security Consulting Inc
	+ Special Advisor
* DLS Technology Corporation
	+ Special Advisor
* HubSpoke Inc.
	+ Special Advisor
* Intelan Consulting Inc.
	+ Special Advisor
* Lionel Drouin
	+ Special Advisor
